short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool to support connect to the application auto play Metamon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Metamon Autoplay

The Metamon Autoplay is a small extension and a first step support user to connect to our application.

It lets the user send the Metamon game login information to the main application. From that application, the user can use the tool for auto play game and see the battle history.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Metamon Autoplay requires the permission to read and write to any webpage.
